headline: ISS Backs Kenvue (KVUE) Deal, Investors Debate Tylenol and Litigation Risks
summary: Kenvue Inc. (NYSE:KVUE) is included on our list of the best undervalued wide moat stocks. Kenvue Inc. (NYSE:KVUE) is looking to potentially reshape the consumer health landscape, as it received institutional support for its proposed merger with Kimberly-Clark. On January 16, 2026, Reuters reported that Institutional Shareholder Services (ISS), a proxy advisory firm, recommended that […]
